mapper.select: select B.* from(select rownum rn, A.* from(select * from info_board order by num desc)A)B where rn between #{str} and #{end}
select B.* from(select rownum rn, A.* from(select * from info_board where ${tag} like '%${word}%')A)B where rn between #{str} and #{end} order by num desc
select count(*) from info_board where ${tag} like '%${word}%'
mapper.update: update info_board set hit=hit+1 where num=#{num}
update info_board set tag=#{tag}, title=#{title}, content=#{content} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from info_board_comment where numgroup=#{numgroup} order by commentgroup desc, step asc, indent asc, savedate desc
mapper.update: update info_board_comment set step=step+1 where numgroup=#{numgroup} and step > #{step}
update info_board_comment set content=#{content} where numgroup=#{numgroup} and commentgroup=#{commentgroup}
mapper.delete: delete from info_board_comment where commentgroup=#{commentgroup} and nick=#{nick} and content=#{content} and numgroup=#{numgroup}
